game.logic

Class Logic

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.logic.Logic

  • public class Logic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes care of all the logic regarding the game. So all the game rules are implemented in this class. This class should not be instantiated but only be used to check if the game rules apply. This class can also be used to do some basic computations regarding the cells and squares.

      • gameIsOver

        public static boolean gameIsOver(Board board,
                                 Player onTurn)
        A board state is game over if one of the following three conditions holds: 1. One square is filled by a single Player. 2. The whole board is filled. 3. One Player cannot make a move because it doesn't have stones left.
        Parameters:
        board -
        Returns:
        If a board state is game over or not.

      • stonesEmpty

        Returns:
        If someone has run out of stones.
